name: Sekaeru
description:
SVGS Summer Gamejam 2022 submission

work-in-progress combat demo featuring crazy frog and gex

second test available 6/30/2022

Controls:
WASD/Left analog: Move
Mouse/Right analog: Camera
Left click/Right bumper: Attack/deathblow
Right click/Left bumper: Block/deflect
Press Shift/Right face button(B/O): Roll
Hold Shift/Right face button(B/O): Sprint
Middle click/Right analog click: Un/Lock on
F/Left trigger: Grapple
Q/Left analog click: Un/Crouch
Escape/start: Pause

Alt-F4 to quit for now lol
